name: SKOverlayDelegate
desc: Methods for responding to the overlayâ€™s appearance, dismissal, or failure to load.

items.name: func storeOverlayWillStartPresentation(SKOverlay, transitionContext: SKOverlay.TransitionContext)
items.desc: Indicates that the platform presents an overlay.

items.name: func storeOverlayDidFinishPresentation(SKOverlay, transitionContext: SKOverlay.TransitionContext)
items.desc: Indicates that the platform finished presenting an overlay.

items.name: func storeOverlayWillStartDismissal(SKOverlay, transitionContext: SKOverlay.TransitionContext)
items.desc: Indicates that the platform dismisses an overlay.

items.name: func storeOverlayDidFinishDismissal(SKOverlay, transitionContext: SKOverlay.TransitionContext)
items.desc: Indicates that platform finished dismissing an overlay.

items.name: class SKOverlay.TransitionContext
items.desc: A context object you can use to animate UI changes while the platform presents or dismisses an overlay.

items.name: func storeOverlayDidFailToLoad(SKOverlay, error: Error)
items.desc: Indicates that an overlay failed to load.
